languages.text: "Меня печалит это решение. Без твоего участия мы можем лишь полностью очистить чертоги данных, в которых наблюдались аномалии, и рассчитывать, что не прогневим этим благого духа. Но твое решение — закон на корабле. Я вынужден подчиниться".

traits.locale_text: "Меня печалит это решение. Без твоего участия мы можем лишь полностью очистить чертоги данных, в которых наблюдались аномалии, и рассчитывать, что не прогневим этим благого духа. Но твое решение — закон на корабле. Я вынужден подчиниться".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "This decision is lamentable. Without your participation, the most we will be able to accomplish is totally purge the data-halls that have demonstrated anomalous behaviour and pray that the good spirit will not be enraged. Nevertheless, on this ship, your decision is law. Therefore, I comply."
languages.original_text: "Меня печалит это решение. Без твоего участия мы можем лишь полностью очистить чертоги данных, в которых наблюдались аномалии, и рассчитывать, что не прогневим этим благого духа. Но твое решение — закон на корабле. Я вынужден подчиниться".

Nevertheless, on this ship, your decision is law. Therefore, I comply."

Nevertheless, on this ship, your decision is law. Therefore, I comply."

traits.locale_text: "This decision is lamentable. Without your participation, the most we will be able to accomplish is totally purge the data-halls that have demonstrated anomalous behaviour and pray that the good spirit will not be enraged. Nevertheless, on this ship, your decision is law. Therefore, I comply."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この決断は嘆かわしいものだ。あなたの参加なしで自分たちに成し遂げられる最大のことは、変則的な振る舞いを見せたデータホールを完全に粛清し、善良な精霊を怒らせぬよう祈ることだ。とは言え、この船の上では、あなたの決断が法律だ。故に、自分は従おう」
languages.original_text: "This decision is lamentable. Without your participation, the most we will be able to accomplish is totally purge the data-halls that have demonstrated anomalous behaviour and pray that the good spirit will not be enraged. Nevertheless, on this ship, your decision is law. Therefore, I comply."

traits.locale_text: 「この決断は嘆かわしいものだ。あなたの参加なしで自分たちに成し遂げられる最大のことは、変則的な振る舞いを見せたデータホールを完全に粛清し、善良な精霊を怒らせぬよう祈ることだ。とは言え、この船の上では、あなたの決断が法律だ。故に、自分は従おう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这样的决定令人遗憾。没有你的参与，我们最多只能彻底清除那些表现出异常行为的数据存储库，祈祷善良的机魂不会被我们的行为激怒。不过在这艘船上，你的决定就是法律，因此我遵从你的命令。”
languages.original_text: "This decision is lamentable. Without your participation, the most we will be able to accomplish is totally purge the data-halls that have demonstrated anomalous behaviour and pray that the good spirit will not be enraged. Nevertheless, on this ship, your decision is law. Therefore, I comply."

traits.locale_text: “这样的决定令人遗憾。没有你的参与，我们最多只能彻底清除那些表现出异常行为的数据存储库，祈祷善良的机魂不会被我们的行为激怒。不过在这艘船上，你的决定就是法律，因此我遵从你的命令。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Entscheidung ist beklagenswert. Ohne Eure Beteiligung können wir bestenfalls eine vollständige Säuberung der Datenhallen erreichen, in denen anomales Verhalten aufgetreten ist, und beten, dass der gute Geist darüber nicht erzürnt ist. Dennoch, auf diesem Schiff sind Eure Entscheidungen Gesetz. Ich werde daher gehorchen."
languages.original_text: "This decision is lamentable. Without your participation, the most we will be able to accomplish is totally purge the data-halls that have demonstrated anomalous behaviour and pray that the good spirit will not be enraged. Nevertheless, on this ship, your decision is law. Therefore, I comply."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Entscheidung ist beklagenswert. Ohne Eure Beteiligung können wir bestenfalls eine vollständige Säuberung der Datenhallen erreichen, in denen anomales Verhalten aufgetreten ist, und beten, dass der gute Geist darüber nicht erzürnt ist. Dennoch, auf diesem Schiff sind Eure Entscheidungen Gesetz. Ich werde daher gehorchen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette décision est regrettable. Sans votre participation, nous pourrons tout au plus purger les salles de données présentant un fonctionnement inhabituel et espérer que l'esprit n'est pas en colère. Néanmoins, sur ce vaisseau, votre décision fait loi. Par conséquent, je m'y soumets. »
languages.original_text: "This decision is lamentable. Without your participation, the most we will be able to accomplish is totally purge the data-halls that have demonstrated anomalous behaviour and pray that the good spirit will not be enraged. Nevertheless, on this ship, your decision is law. Therefore, I comply."

traits.locale_text: « Cette décision est regrettable. Sans votre participation, nous pourrons tout au plus purger les salles de données présentant un fonctionnement inhabituel et espérer que l'esprit n'est pas en colère. Néanmoins, sur ce vaisseau, votre décision fait loi. Par conséquent, je m'y soumets. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esa decisión es lamentable. Sin su participación, lo mejor que conseguiremos será una purga total de las salas de datos que han exhibido conductas anómalas y rezar para que el buen espíritu no monte en cólera. Con todo, en esta nave, su palabra es ley. Por tanto, la acataré».
languages.original_text: "This decision is lamentable. Without your participation, the most we will be able to accomplish is totally purge the data-halls that have demonstrated anomalous behaviour and pray that the good spirit will not be enraged. Nevertheless, on this ship, your decision is law. Therefore, I comply."

traits.locale_text: «Esa decisión es lamentable. Sin su participación, lo mejor que conseguiremos será una purga total de las salas de datos que han exhibido conductas anómalas y rezar para que el buen espíritu no monte en cólera. Con todo, en esta nave, su palabra es ley. Por tanto, la acataré».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Kararınız esef edilesi. Katılımınız olmaksızın başarabileceğimiz tek şey, anomali davranışlarının görüldüğü veri koridorlarını tamamen arındırmak olabilir. Bu durumda ise tek yapabileceğimiz, faziletli ruhun hiddetlenmemesi için dua etmektir. Her hâlükârda bu gemide sözünüz kanundur. Bu yüzden itaat edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "This decision is lamentable. Without your participation, the most we will be able to accomplish is totally purge the data-halls that have demonstrated anomalous behaviour and pray that the good spirit will not be enraged. Nevertheless, on this ship, your decision is law. Therefore, I comply."

traits.locale_text: "Kararınıza esef ediliyor. Katılımınız olmaksızın başarabileceğimiz tek şey, anomali davranışlarının görüldüğü veri koridorlarının tamamen arındırılması olur. Bu durumda ise tak yapabileceğimiz faziletli ruhun hiddetlenmemesi için dua etmektir. Ne olursa olsun... Bu gemide kararınız kanundur. Bu yüzden itaat edeceğim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
